code:
/*
包含应用中所有api
 */import ajax from'./ajax';import md5 from'md5';//登入
export var reqLogin=function reqLogin(username,password){password=md5(password);return ajax('/api/login',{username:username,password:password},'POST');};//获取用户列表
export var reqUserList=function reqUserList(){return ajax('/api/user',{'type':'get'},'POST');};//更新用户
export var reqUpdateUser=function reqUpdateUser(username,password,authority){password=md5(password);return ajax('/api/user',{'type':'update',username:username,password:password,authority:authority},'POST');};//删除用户
export var reqDelUser=function reqDelUser(username){return ajax('/api/user',{'type':'del',username:username},'POST');};//获取角色列表
export var reqAuthorityList=function reqAuthorityList(){return ajax('/api/authority',{'type':'get'},'POST');};//更新角色
export var reqUpdateAuthority=function reqUpdateAuthority(name){var menus=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'';return ajax('/api/authority',{'type':'update',name:name,menus:menus},'POST');};//删除角色
export var reqDelAuthority=function reqDelAuthority(name){return ajax('/api/authority',{'type':'del',name:name},'POST');};//获取收藏类
export var reqFavTypeList=function reqFavTypeList(){return ajax('/api/favourites/favtype',{'type':'get'},'POST');};//删除收藏类
export var reqDelType=function reqDelType(title){return ajax('/api/favourites/favtype',{'type':'del',title:title},'POST');};//更新收藏类
export var reqUpdateType=function reqUpdateType(title,rank){var oldTitle=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:undefined;return ajax('/api/favourites/favtype',{'type':'update',title:title,rank:rank,oldTitle:oldTitle},'POST');};//移动收藏类
export var reqMoveType=function reqMoveType(fType,tType){return ajax('/api/favourites/favtype',{'type':'move',fType:fType,tType:tType},'POST');};//获取收藏项
export var reqFavItemList=function reqFavItemList(){var favType=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:undefined;return ajax('/api/favourites/favitem',{'type':'get',favType:favType},'POST');};//删除收藏项
export var reqDelItem=function reqDelItem(url){return ajax('/api/favourites/favitem',{'type':'del',url:url},'POST');};//更新收藏项
export var reqUpdateItem=function reqUpdateItem(url){var favType=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:undefined;var title=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:undefined;var rank=arguments.length>3&&arguments[3]!==undefined?arguments[3]:undefined;var description=arguments.length>4&&arguments[4]!==undefined?arguments[4]:undefined;var oldUrl=arguments.length>5&&arguments[5]!==undefined?arguments[5]:undefined;return ajax('/api/favourites/favitem',{'type':'update',url:url,favType:favType,title:title,rank:rank,description:description,oldUrl:oldUrl},'POST');};
